string.text: Ready. Just don't do anything stupid, 'cause this place has gotta be crawling with muties. We'll have a quick look around, then head outside â€” I ain't planning on staying for vacation.
I'd say we mopped 'em up pretty good! Let's move on.

What part don't you get, genius? You go down there and check every single inch. Come back and let us know what you find... or at least fatten the muties up so they don't come here. We ain't about to go busting our balls with you.
Oh, so that's how it's gonna be? And what if I tell your boss you stayed on the top level and dumped me?

You wanna tell the boss, huh? What if we find a Fruit Punch and hold your face to it for a minute or two? Now, if you don't fancy lookin' like fresh boar roast, I'd suggest you go on ahead, capiche? We'll sit tight here.
You bastards! I help you clean the factory and this is how you repay me?

Now look who's talking! Just who in the hell did you "help" over there? We know you were on your ass twiddling your thumbs while our guys were dropping like flies. So don't be coming to me like some knight in shining armor, or I'll shove those plates where the sun don't shine on 'em no more.
